name: Bounce (itch) (import-this)
description:
A simple HTML5 game inspired by a now pretty old version of Artem Rakhmatulin's Insanity!

Click anywhere and drag the mouse to move the circle. Avoid the moving shapes for as long as you can.

UPDATE (25/11/2016): Now with 3 mutators:

  • Fast: The boxes are moving faster than normal.
  • Speedup: The boxes speed up as time passes by.
  • Five: Pretty much what you think it is. Five boxes.

Thanks to the people at /r/playmygame for their suggestions.

TODO:

  • Add leaderboard.

You can play the standalone game on GitHub pages or view the source code on GitHub.

Made with Phaser.

Thank you for your support. Hope you enjoy. :)
